mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USER_INFO ( USER_ID, TYPE, STATUS, EMAIL, PASSWORD, OLD_PASSWORD, PASSWORD_MODIFIED_AT, PASSWORD_WRONG_COUNT, LAST_LOGIN_AT, NAME, MOBILE, BIRTH_DATE, GENDER, ROLES, JOINED_AT, MODIFIED_AT, WITHDRAWN_AT ) VALUES ( #{userId.id}, #{type}, #{status}, #{account.email}, #{account.password}, #{account.oldPassword}, #{account.passwordModifiedAt}, #{account.passwordWrongCount}, #{account.lastLoginAt}, #{profile.name}, #{profile.mobile}, #{profile.birthDate}, #{profile.gender}, #{roles}, #{joinedAt}, #{modifiedAt}, #{withdrawnAt} )
mapper.update: UPDATE USER_INFO SET LAST_LOGIN_AT = #{account.lastLoginAt}, PASSWORD_WRONG_COUNT = #{account.passwordWrongCount}, MODIFIED_AT = #{modifiedAt} WHERE USER_ID = #{userId.id}
UPDATE USER_INFO SET NAME = #{profile.name}, MOBILE = #{profile.mobile}, BIRTH_DATE = #{profile.birthDate}, GENDER = #{profile.gender}, MODIFIED_AT = #{modifiedAt} WHERE USER_ID = #{userId.id}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM USER_INFO WHERE 1 = 1 AND USER_ID = #{id}
SELECT * FROM USER_INFO WHERE 1 = 1 AND USER_ID = #{id} AND WITHDRAWN_AT IS NULL
SELECT * FROM USER_INFO WHERE 1 = 1 AND EMAIL = #{email}
